<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>true</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>true</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>incident</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition/><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>Lab 7.1 SAP Incidents</name><order>150</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/ ) {

    // Add your code here
    var sapIncs = new GlideRecord("incident");
    sapIncs.addActiveQuery();
    sapIncs.addQuery("short_description", "CONTAINS", "SAP");
    sapIncs.query();

    while (sapIncs.next()) {
        myResult = myResult + sapIncs.number + ", ";
    }
    gs.addErrorMessage("These records are active SAP Incidents:" + myResult);

})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-03-25 02:12:16</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>3afc73732f12011042ab265df699b6e9</sys_id><sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Lab 7.1 SAP Incidents</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="IPLookup" source="x_791185_iplookup">1e9b28732f96011042ab265df699b66b</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="IPLookup">1e9b28732f96011042ab265df699b66b</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_3afc73732f12011042ab265df699b6e9</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-03-25 02:21:19</sys_updated_on><template/><when>after</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=3afc73732f12011042ab265df699b6e9"/></record_update>
